body:
Hey, I ripped this idea off OCN.
Apollo was orginially called "The Game Changers" we have played every tourney so far and never finished below 3rd. The team was founded by Pizza334 and is currently lead by Pizza334, JustBudah and Legoche.

Remember, ask @everyone for everybody and @(playername) for a specific person. We won't reply to anything toxic.
Ask away! :)

replies.body:
I don't know too much about the city.

Yeah of course

I am for it, it's really good for the community - Badlion is taking over and at the moment it's probably in my top 3 favorite servers.

I don't want Trump, he is mean to Bloodoh :c

I honestly try not to give a fuck. It's online gaming and at the end of the day I can find better things to do.

I'm not far off my GCSEs and I don't know where the fuck my life is going at the moment.

I play for my team. Nothing else. I found Avicus a while back when I wanted something to do in my free time. At the moment Avicus since OCN updated but to be honest OCN was nearly overtaking Avicus when it was 1.8.

No. Too many hackers, hackusaters and the community is toxic as fuck. I really think that OCN/Avicus style game play won't grow too much but Badlion style PvP is growing a lot, if CTF there works then I can see it overtaking us and OCN.

When giving positions you need to think smart. Putting 3 good archers on one side and 3 good melee on one side isn't a good idea. Mix them up, know you're teammates individual skill.

We have gotten so far, I am really proud and I cannot see myself joining any new team.

Avicus is nearly dead. The competitive scene has no active teams and it's sad to see the direction the community has gone. I see a lot of OCN players coming here, but their community is nearly dead aswell.

I find it funny and annoying. It's kinda a compliment but at the same time gets constant and annoying.

No, sorry but it's weird being with someone you may never meet. Zero and Cat cutie are cute as fuck

Well you're good at all round PvP and bridging, work on communication and you'll be really good.

I kinda like it but the knockback hasn't seemed to change and bucket lag still exists so i think that the community (Kohi especially) have the right to be mad. 

I don't really follow it but i think it's pretty scary that a guy like that could come to power. Hillary Clinton? 

Go outside or watch your favourite TV show. Doing anything relaxing is better than getting annoyed over your internet.

Life is awesome at the moment. England has suddenly gotten really hot where I live. Apparently hotter than Ibiza :D

Only really to Moderate, get 1000 monuments and to scrim. I played alot of SG/HG when i first came on but then I quit for ages. I came back when McZone had recently updated to Avicore and have only played Nebula and Nexus since. Avicus Since OCN is 1.9 (that I hate with a burning passion). The Sun will die in like 10000000000000000000000 years, therefore the Earth dying.

I think that people don't realise how competitive it actually is so I don't think it will become an e-sport anytime soon.

Remaining calm, speaks clearly, can think on the spot quickly.

In the last month i think we have improved in TDM alot due to more confidence.

I think Atlas and the new tournament will give it a chance to grow massively. If this doesn't work i don't know what will.

Don't care to be honest, pretty funny.

People can if they want to, i'd never do it because i wouldnt feel confident.

Your internet is really annoying to fight against xP Really nice and i like your sense of humor :) I think if you just keep playing you'll suddenly get better like most people do.

replies.body:
MC stresses me out much more which is partly what I blame for being all salty over here, leading 8-12 people, trying to keep them all under control as opposed to in CSGO just playing alongside 5 people it's much more fun, not only that but CSGO has far less hackers and far less game breaking problems unlike Avicus. I'm also still adjusting to the fact that my team and I are no longer the dominant best around so I get salty over that too :P

As for the rest of your answers I'm happy to agree although at some point Ronloyd was the MVP of the entire server :P 2014 competitive, before you lot were around he was ridiculously good. 

Hope you get better and I'll always hit you up when we 10 man.

I was lucky enough that many of my closer friends that I made on this game made the switch to CSGO with me so I found leaving much easier. :) 

I hope that before I'm completely gone I can sort of make amends with you and your team, I wish you the best and you should win tourney 3 factoring out any crazy upsets.

However those who have been banned for hacks I'm not chill with :/
GL HF
